name: A Look on Life
description:
How does one's mindset influence their look on life? Will you see the negative things as blackness in your world? How does one respond to all this? 

In this game, we follow the life of a high school student, Evan. He struggles with his life as events from the past trouble his mind.  Help him sort things out, find peace with things, or do the opposite...?

Please consider giving me feedback!
